title: State v. Gary Mitchum Reeves – Episode 8 – We Buried the Gun with Mama
description:
August 31, 2017 / In the mid-1990’s, Gary tried to reopen the investigation into Grace’s murder, but he would need to find new evidence in order to have his conviction overturned. And Beverly’s statements about her mother’s murder provided a clue about where the murder weapon might be found.

(Photo: Grace Reynolds, date unknown.)

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to our sponsors!
